name: fittrack-landing-page
description: FitTrack - Modern fitness tracking landing page with responsive design

scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:html && npm run build:assets
scripts.build:assets: shx mkdir -p dist/images dist/fonts && shx cp -r images/* dist/images/ && shx cp -r fonts/* dist/fonts/
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:css
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && shx mkdir -p dist/css dist/js dist/images dist/fonts
